feed.title: Free the People
feed.subtitle: We are a small, grassroots organization seeking to support the resistance against the oligarchy...

entry.title: Week in Review
entry.summary: Recap of this week in the revolution: The United States joins the Axis of Evil and Trump and Vance disgrace the nation on the world stage, destroying our relationship with our former allies around the world. Gaza gives Trump the finger for releasing a video where he takes over Gaza and is idolized for it. GOP representatives allow their constituents to be bullied and brutalized in front of them, while members of Congress declare that federal employees do not deserve their jobs or their paychecks. Join the resistance by calling your representatives and telling them to vote no on the SAVE act, join the March 4th for Democracy protests, or any of the numerous protests happening every day all across the country, and take courses in civil resistance or protecting voting rights.

entry.title: Week in Review
entry.summary: Recap of this week in the revolution. Trump does more damage in 30 days in office than any other enemy in history, the resistance finds a new anthem in Hostile Government Takeover by A Gift from Todd, more Republicans openly display the Nazi salute to cheering crowds, Trump supporters start to realize that Trump's policies are as damaging to them as they are to the rest of the country, and Free the People launches a new merch store to sell the disgraced flag of the United States. Join the fight by participating in the February 28 blackout, taking a Minute of US at 12:53 pm every Wednesday, or joining an Indivisible.org Zoom call to find out "What's the plan?"
